channel.title: Building Your Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Building Your Village" - it says on the kage council that it says in the faq about how to recruit people to your village but where

item.title: Re: Building Your Village
item.content:encoded: Get friends in there for a bit, and wait until people come. No big deal.

item.title: Building Your Village
item.content:encoded:
well im a season 2 jounin

and started my village up but havent got any members in a week im wondering how do you start building your village when you cant pick up wandeers untill you reach 5 villagers big

how is it anyone else starts ??
